title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, it still shows the old column names instead of the newly set aliases.
EB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, it should show the newly set aliases for the columns.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. Ensure that the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases.
